content:
Customer Service Incident Management provides a series of sample flows that you can customize and activate to streamline your incident resolution process.

Close Change Request & Related Issues

To cut down on repeat tasks when an incident is resolved, automatically close a change request and its related issues, like cases, problems, and incidents. For example, an agent uses the Close Change Request & Related Issues flow from the Actions & Recommendation component on the change request to close related issues.

Change Case Owner to Incident Owner

When cases are identified as part of an overarching incident and to avoid duplicative work, automatically change the case owner to the incident owner. An agent uses the Change Case Owner to Incident Owner flow from the Actions & Recommendations component on the incident to change the owner of the cases to the incident owner.

Customer Service Incident Management Sample Flows 

Let us know if this article solved your issue.
title: Customer Service Incident Management
